comment: Not trying to brag or anything , but if it wasn't for me , Clark's expedition wouldn't of gotten across Idaho . Fun fact ; I guided Clark's expedition of the Salmon River and I led the entire party from the Lemhi River ( Salmon , Idaho ) over the Bitterroot Mountains --->
amr:
# ::snt Not trying to brag or anything , but if it wasn't for me , Clark's expedition wouldn't of gotten across Idaho . Fun fact ; I guided Clark's expedition of the Salmon River and I led the entire party from the Lemhi River ( Salmon , Idaho ) over the Bitterroot Mountains --->
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (t / try-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (o / or
                        :op1 (b / brag-01
                              :ARG0 ii)
                        :op2 (a / anything)))
            :ARG2 (g / get-05
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (e / expedition
                        :poss (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Clark")))
                  :ARG2 (a2 / across
                        :op1 (s / state
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Idaho")))
                  :condition (h / have-polarity-91
                        :ARG1 (e2 / expedition
                              :poss p)
                        :ARG2 -)
                  :ARG1-of h
                  :ARG2 -))
      :snt2 (f / fact
            :mod (f2 / fun)
            :domain (a3 / and
                  :op1 (g2 / guide-01
                        :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                        :ARG1 (e3 / expedition
                              :mod (r / river
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Salemhi"
                                          :op2 "River")
                                    :location s)))
                  :op2 (l / lead-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (p2 / party
                              :mod (e4 / entire))
                        :ARG2 (o2 / over
                              :op1 (m2 / mountain
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "Bitterroot"
                                          :op2 "Mountains")))))))
